```
cd /home/svn/project/conf/
vim PtoWP.pl
```
```
#!/usr/bin/perl
use warnings;
use strict;

#open the svn passwd file
open (FILE, "passwd") or die ("Cannot open the passwd file!!!n");

#clear the apache passwd file
open (OUT_FILE, ">webpasswd") or die ("Cannot open the webpasswd file!!!n");
close (OUT_FILE);

#begin
foreach () {
if($_ =~ m/^[^#].*=/) {
$_ =~ s/=//;
`htpasswd -b webpasswd $_`;
}
}
```

## NFS

### NFS

NFS(LinuxNFS)

ubuntuNFS`$ dpkg -l | grep nfs`

fedora/centosNFS`$ rpm -qa | grep nfs`

NFS

```
$ sudo apt-get install nfs-kernel-server nfs-common
```

fedora/centosNFS
```
# yum install nfs
```

### 

NFS `/etc`  `exports` 

 `/etc/exports`
NFS`exports` 
```
# /etc/exports: the access control list for filesystems which may be exported
#       to NFS clients.  See exports(5).
#
# Example for NFSv2 and NFSv3:
# /srv/homes       hostname1(rw,sync,no_subtree_check) hostname2(ro,sync,no_subtree_check)
#
# Example for NFSv4:
# /srv/nfs4        gss/krb5i(rw,sync,fsid=0,crossmnt,no_subtree_check)
# /srv/nfs4/homes  gss/krb5i(rw,sync,no_subtree_check)
```
NFSexports

exports `/your_path/nfs_dir *(rw,sync,no_root_squash)` 

 **`/your_path/nfs_dir`**  **`nfs_dir`**  `/home/foo/share`  exports `/home/foo/share *(rw,sync,no_root_squash)`  `network(permission parameters)`

`*`IP `192.168.1.36` `58.154.190.0/24(58.154.190.0/255.255.255.0)` `*.neu.edu.cn` ( `/etc/hosts` DNS)`*`

**`(rw,sync,root_squash)`**

NFS

|Parameter|Description|
|:-|:-|
|`ro`||
|`rw`|sync|
|`async`|nfs|
|`secure`|nfs1024TCP/IP|
|`insecure`|nfs1024|
|`wdelay`|nfs|
|`no_wdelay`|nfsasync|
|`hide`|nfs|
|`no_hide`|nfs|
|`subtree_check`|/usr/binnfs|
|`no_subtree_check`||
|`all_squash`|UIDGIDanonymous|
|`no_all_squash`|UIDGID|
|`root_squash`|rootanonymous|
|`no_root_squas`|root()|
|`anonuid=xxx`|nfs/etc/passwdUID|
|`anongid=xxx`|nfs/etc/passwdGID|

`# exportfs rv` 

NFS
```
$ sudo /etc/init.d/nfs-kernel-server restart
```

NFSRPCportmapportmap

```
$ sudo /etc/init.d/portmap restart
```

```

```
$ mount -t nfs 192.168.1.36:/home/foo/share /home/zoo/nfs
```
 `/home/zoo/nfs`

```
host_ip:/host_share_path /local_mount_path nfs defaults
